channel.title: Androids on NiceTux by Matthew Hungerford
channel.description: Recent content in Androids on NiceTux by Matthew Hungerford

item.title: EVMazing Maze Game
item.description: For a kids event at my work, we wanted to use some Google Chrome Monitors to have educational games available for the kids to play.

item.title: Qtstickercam
item.description: My son got a webcam for his PC, and wanted to do stickers on pictures, similar to those on Android and IPhone mobile apps.

item.title: Cosmo's Star
item.description: Qt-based game for Android/Web/Linux written as part of the itch.

item.title: Unicorn Paint
item.description: For my daughters upcoming birthday I wrote a fun little finger-painting game.
